really fun just want half life 3

Una obra maestra adelantada a su tiempo.
Tengan en cuenta que salio en el 2004, mismo año que el gta san andreas y tiene tremendos gráficos.

Half Life 2, for a sequel, it's not bad. Better than the original I'd say. The story is fleshed out, and unlike the first game, players no longer have to guesstimate what something is. There are terrifying moments, and somber moments, comical moments, and you know what? There weren't any happy moments. You have to go off your own satisfactions.

The gameplay and controls are easy and natural to get a hold of, and the world is large and expansive, each level having it's own unique take on the genre. It's so big in fact, that it is very, very easy to get lost. At least half of my hour count was spent running around blindly without a clue of where to go.

The difficulty, like all Halflife games is adjustable, but even the easiest difficulty setting still retains some challenge. The achievements are also challenging, and original ideas each, but not so difficult that they're impossible to figure out.

If you enjoy faffing about with no clue of where you're going, blasting the heads off enemies, and piecing the puzzle pieces together on your own I highly recommend it. If you enjoy more of a stealth or tactic style shooter, you may not enjoy this game nearly as much.
es divertido y emocionante con una gran historia, recomiendo jugar el primer juego para que entiendan mejor
If you're looking for reviews for Half Life in 2020, just buy the damn game.

The one that started it all, Half-Life 2 has to be one of the most impressive games released in 2004, The A.I was incredibly smart, graphics were outstanding, gameplay was incredibly fun and the story was incredibly deep. Even nowadays it still holds up pretty well, people still like it and the games it spawned. It's a part of personal computer history, It showed what was possible to simulate in real-time incredibly well.
I highly recommend to get the game when it's on sale, Which is basically all the time.

Que no se ha dicho ya de Half Life 2, es una joya atemporal, si bien no es perfecto pero todo lo que compone al juego es grandioso, gráficos que para tener mas de 15 años han envejecido bien, jugabilidad impecable, historia inmersíva, una dirección artística asombrosa, el único pero que siempre le he puesto, son las molestas pantallas de carga que aparecen abruptamente. 

Un Juego que debe ser un si o si para todo aquel que se diga gamer, nos quedamos y nos quedaremos esperando el 3 pero aun asi este juego es sublime,
хз почему но мне понравилось советую!
this game is really really good and i very recommend you will have much life

I'd have to assume that if you're looking at this, you already know about this game and all its wonders. Half-Life 2 is a genre-defining game that introduced or enhanced many things which today are considered FPS core elements from its style to its game play.  This game needs to be played to properly understand it, but if you take the time to really get into the title, you'll come to understand why it's so loved to this very day!
its the mother of all shooters. its incredible in how many aspects this game was revolutionary.

Шла в комплекте Валв комплит пак который стоил 600р по распродаже, всего 1 день мне понадобился чтобы пройти все 3 части, и знаете, сюжет лучше чем в некоторых других играх 2019 года, а игра то 2007.
Сюжет и локализация очень сильно проработаны, Валв пыталась сделатт игру для массового потребителя и это видно, если углубится в эту историю то будет понятно кто такой Барни и почему тот должен ему пиво. Так то сказать более нечего, Будем ждать HL ALYX и надеяться в то что русская локализация там будет.
10/10.

SImplemente es uno de los mejores juegos de la historia, no hay por donde mirar un defecto porque no los tiene.
Tiene una historia INCREIBLE, una jugabilidad completa, mapas diversos, una banda sonora excelente. Hoy 16 años despues de su lanzamiento sigue siendo una obra maestra que te pone en la piel de Gordon y puede hacerte lagrimear con sus escenas tristes y volverte un asesino cuando empieza la musica de accion. Y como si no fuera poco, tambien esta relacionado con otra obra maestra de Valve la cual es Portal.
Un titulo al que obligadamente se debe jugar. 
Siempre recomendado.

When this game came out, I didn't have the PC to play it, Everyone talks about how amazing Half-Life 2 is, 15 years later; I'm here to tell you: 
Believe the hype. The graphics still hold up really well. HL2 has amazing writing that leaves you wanting more. Challenging gameplay and some very creative level design, combined with some super fun mechanics like the gravity gun makes for a hella good time. Althought I don't really see much replay value personally; you can do things like increasing the difficulty to challenge yourself with a second playthrough, finding easter eggs, and achievement hunting.  Other than that, this is a genre defining masterpiece. If you haven't played this pick it up immediately.
A master piece . . . No need more words for this game

[b]Truly a masterpiece... please give us Half Life 3[/b]

In this game, you play as a character named Gordon Freeman. Like in every other Valve game, you cannot speak. In this game, you adventure on with the likes of Barney (Calhoun?), A Scientist with a pet Headcrab, and one of the new characters in this series (who is getting her own game), Alyx. Yes, it's spelled Alyx... bloody weird parents. Speaking of parents, you will meet your long time fellow scientist friend/co-worker Eli. You and them work together to stop Dr. Breen (who you also know and used to be your Administrator) and the Combines from stoping the Human Species to mate? Also there is a guy who dreams about cheese.

This game is known to be the most advanced at its time featuring physics, amazing lighting, great graphics and great puzzles. Even if you did finish the game, you may come back to find some secrets and get rare achievements. I would say that this game still stands as one of the best games of this decade (The decade ends on 2021 you morons, speaking of morons I will be playing Portal 2 after HL2|E1 and E2). I highly recommend this game to people who enjoy games with a good story and a great game design.
